name: Apostles'Creed
0:
”Alexa, open apostles creed”
”recite the apostles creed”
”say the apostles creed”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: apostles creed
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Apostles' Creed uses your Alexa to recite the apostles creed back to you. when asked it will respond by reciting the creed to you. you may also hear it in a more natural human voice by getting the Premium Subscription
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
